original_text: The Lord has said, ‘The people in Nineveh are many. And they think that they are safe. But I will kill them. I have punished you, my people, before now. But I will not punish you any more.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 그들이 비록 강하고 많을지라도 반드시 멸절을 당하리니 그가 없어지리라 내가 전에는 너를 괴롭혔으나 다시는 너를 괴롭히지 아니할 것이라

sentences.original_text: The people in Nineveh are many
And they think that they are safe
I have punished you, my people
But I will not punish you any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 더는 너희를 벌하지 않을 것이다
